description: Prepared with chicken wings, ranch dressing, hot sauce, honey & butter
Prepared with 1x single chicken patty, 1x sliced cheddar cheese, secret sauce, sliced onion, tomato & lettuce
Spicy, crunchy two chicken strips in a bigger & longer sesame bun, combined with fresh crunchy lettuce, sweet mayo with an amazing blend two different sauces

Bathed in peri peri marinade, grilled to add caramelization, then a blanket of peri peri glaze added to seal the flavors & finally topped with special herbs - have a bite of kfc peri peri grilled chicken for 2 pcs only at Tk.299 which is sure to play with your taste buds.
Topped with button & black mushroom fungi combo-based with white sauce, mozzarella, cheddar & feta, spicy onion, roasted tomato, green sauce & sea salt
Topped with soft chunks of spicy sausages surrounded by parmesan cheese infused with kisan cheese which finally gets topped off with our special naga sauce to give your tastebuds, that extra kick.
Topped with chicken, alfredo sauce & 3 types of cheese.
Topped with pepperoni, mozzarella cheese & pizza sauce.
Topped with meat ball & mozzarella cheese.
Deep fried chicken nuggets with rich cheese filling.
Consists of 4 pcs bbq chicken burgers, 2 portions of large fries & 4 coke - 250 ml.
Consists of a portion of french fries, choice of 1 pc beef cheese delight burger or chicken cheese delight burger & 1 regular brownie shake.

Massive double chicken patty of patty cooked with bbq sauce & stuffed with cheese, topped with chicken bacon & slice of cheddar cheese. It is served with secret sauce of your flavor, fresh onions, lettuce & cushion of comfortable buns.
